description: I. Letter dated 12/02/2009 from Mike O'Brien MP to Elliott Morley MP regarding the consultation paper on the proposed offshore gas storage and gas unloading licensing scheme. 1 p. II. Consultation on the proposed offshore gas storage and gas unloading licensing scheme. 79 p. III. Gas storage licence : operatorship guidance (consultation version). 9 p. IV. Gas storage development guidance (consultation version February 2009) : suggested contents of the gas storage development plan. 5 p.
department: Dept of Energy and Climate Change
